<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Temporary hack: disable high vectorization factors with integer</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// division/remainder, which will get scalarized and handled with</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// GR128 registers. The mischeduler is not clever enough to avoid</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 1000;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// These FP operations are supported with a single vector instruction for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// double (base implementation assumes float generally costs 2). For</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FP128, the scalar cost is 1, and there is no overhead since the values</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// are already in scalar registers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opcode == Instruction::FAdd || Opcode == Instruction::FSub ||</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">switch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ScalarBits) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 32: &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The vector enhancements facility 1 provides v4f32 instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ST-&gt;hasVectorEnhancements1())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumVectors;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Return the cost of multiple scalar invocation plus the cost of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// inserting and extracting the values.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> ScalarCost =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzttiimpl/#acb4134cc102c16e03344a4b4b21f1ea7">getArithmeticInstrCost</a>(Opcode, Ty-&gt;getScalarType(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Log2Diff = <a href="#a2f0f3c8ae1e70783849672eb85b035fc">getElSizeLog2Diff</a>(SrcTy, DstTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VF = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(SrcTy)-&gt;getNumElements();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> &lt; Log2Diff; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NumParts &gt; 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><Highlight kind="normal">      NumParts /= 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += NumParts;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Currently, a general mix of permutes and pack instructions is output by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// isel, which follow the cost computation above except for this case which</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is one instruction less:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (VF == 8 &amp;&amp; SrcTy-&gt;getScalarSizeInBits() == 64 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><Highlight kind="normal">      DstTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a9f382207d841377156d4c7868b66b9a5">getScalarSizeInBits</a>() == 8)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>--;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="817"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Return the cost of converting a vector bitmask produced by a compare</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="818"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (SrcTy), to the type of the select or extend instruction (DstTy).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzttiimpl/#ac9187fccb0fa44ecfef081f99dd17029"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzttiimpl/#ac9187fccb0fa44ecfef081f99dd17029">SystemZTTIImpl::</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzttiimpl/#ac9187fccb0fa44ecfef081f99dd17029">getVectorBitmaskConversionCost</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;SrcTy, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;DstTy) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a> (SrcTy-&gt;isVectorTy() &amp;&amp; DstTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a1bc022868b23918efa44df511f4d5b61">isVectorTy</a>() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Should only be called with vector types.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PackCost = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SrcScalarBits = SrcTy-&gt;getScalarSizeInBits();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DstScalarBits = DstTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a9f382207d841377156d4c7868b66b9a5">getScalarSizeInBits</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Log2Diff = <a href="#a2f0f3c8ae1e70783849672eb85b035fc">getElSizeLog2Diff</a>(SrcTy, DstTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SrcScalarBits &gt; DstScalarBits)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The bitmask will be truncated.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><Highlight kind="normal">    PackCost = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzttiimpl/#a694f0a06fb32a28862ef184803eaadd8">getVectorTruncCost</a>(SrcTy, DstTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SrcScalarBits &lt; DstScalarBits) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DstNumParts = <a href="#af4be533423e3315d09f9d6ff82049e3b">getNumVectorRegs</a>(DstTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Each vector select needs its part of the bitmask unpacked.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><Highlight kind="normal">    PackCost = Log2Diff &#42; DstNumParts;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Extra cost for moving part of mask before unpacking.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><Highlight kind="normal">    PackCost += DstNumParts - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PackCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="840"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Return the type of the compared operands. This is needed to compute the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="843"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// cost for a Select / ZExt or SExt instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="844" lineLink="#a5e5d97b679ac5ed7ad7f5b4639c450d7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;<a href="#a5e5d97b679ac5ed7ad7f5b4639c450d7">getCmpOpsType</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VF = 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="845"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;OpTy = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst">CmpInst</a> &#42;CI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;CmpInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getOperand(0)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="847"><Highlight kind="normal">    OpTy = CI-&gt;getOperand(0)-&gt;getType();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;LogicI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getOperand(0)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LogicI-&gt;getNumOperands() == 2)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst">CmpInst</a> &#42;CI0 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;CmpInst&gt;</a>(LogicI-&gt;getOperand(0)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;CmpInst&gt;</a>(LogicI-&gt;getOperand(1)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><Highlight kind="normal">          OpTy = CI0-&gt;getOperand(0)-&gt;getType();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OpTy != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (VF == 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a> (!OpTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a1bc022868b23918efa44df511f4d5b61">isVectorTy</a>() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expected scalar type&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OpTy;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Return the potentially vectorized type based on &#39;I&#39; and &#39;VF&#39;.  &#39;I&#39; may</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// be either scalar or already vectorized with a same or lesser VF.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;ElTy = OpTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a7c742b32ebcd73d6dc851afac295b0f2">getScalarType</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SrcScalarBits = Src-&gt;getScalarSizeInBits();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1021"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// inserting and extracting the values. Base implementation does not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1022"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// realize float-&gt;int gets scalarized.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1023"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> ScalarCost = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzttiimpl/#ab3f2b8802cc38cd06a851443f6412807">getCastInstrCost</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1024"><Highlight kind="normal">          Opcode, Dst-&gt;getScalarType(), Src-&gt;getScalarType(), CCH, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1025"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> TotCost = VF &#42; ScalarCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1026"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NeedsInserts = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, NeedsExtracts = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FP128 registers do not get inserted or extracted.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DstScalarBits == 128 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1029"><Highlight kind="normal">          (Opcode == Instruction::SIToFP || Opcode == Instruction::UIToFP))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1030"><Highlight kind="normal">        NeedsInserts = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1031"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SrcScalarBits == 128 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"><Highlight kind="normal">          (Opcode == Instruction::FPToSI || Opcode == Instruction::FPToUI))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"><Highlight kind="normal">        NeedsExtracts = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1034"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1035"><Highlight kind="normal">      TotCost += <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ad46cd19003cfbd8c6436b8c92172efa8">BaseT::getScalarizationOverhead</a>(SrcVecTy, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;Insert&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                 NeedsExtracts, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"><Highlight kind="normal">      TotCost += <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ad46cd19003cfbd8c6436b8c92172efa8">BaseT::getScalarizationOverhead</a>(DstVecTy, NeedsInserts,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                 </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;Extract&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: VF 2 for float&lt;-&gt;i32 is currently just as expensive as for VF 4</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (VF == 2 &amp;&amp; SrcScalarBits == 32 &amp;&amp; DstScalarBits == 32)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042"><Highlight kind="normal">        TotCost &#42;= 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1043"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1044"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TotCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1045"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1047"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opcode == Instruction::FPTrunc) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SrcScalarBits == 128)  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// fp128 -&gt; double/float + inserts of elements.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1049"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VF </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;ldxbr/lexbr&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1050"><Highlight kind="normal">               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ad46cd19003cfbd8c6436b8c92172efa8">BaseT::getScalarizationOverhead</a>(DstVecTy, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;Insert&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1051"><Highlight kind="normal">                                               </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;Extract&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1052"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// double -&gt; float</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1053"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VF / 2 </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;vledb&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> + std::max(1U, VF / 4 </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;vperm&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1054"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1055"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1056"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opcode == Instruction::FPExt) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1057"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SrcScalarBits == 32 &amp;&amp; DstScalarBits == 64) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// float -&gt; double is very rare and currently unoptimized. Instead of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1059"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// using vldeb, which can do two at a time, all conversions are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// scalarized.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VF &#42; 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// -&gt; fp128.  VF &#42; lxdb/lxeb + extraction of elements.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VF + <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ad46cd19003cfbd8c6436b8c92172efa8">BaseT::getScalarizationOverhead</a>(SrcVecTy, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;Insert&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;Extract&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1091"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1092"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!ValTy-&gt;isVectorTy()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1093"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">switch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opcode) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1094"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Instruction::ICmp: &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1095"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A loaded value compared with 0 with multiple users becomes Load and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1096"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Test. The load is then not foldable, so return 0 cost for the ICmp.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1097"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ScalarBits = ValTy-&gt;getScalarSizeInBits();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1098"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&amp; (ScalarBits == 32 || ScalarBits == 64))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1099"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loadinst">LoadInst</a> &#42;Ld = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;LoadInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getOperand(0)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1100"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint">ConstantInt</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getOperand(1)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1101"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Ld-&gt;hasOneUse() &amp;&amp; Ld-&gt;getParent() == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getParent() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1102"><Highlight kind="normal">                <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>-&gt;isZero())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1103"><Highlight kind="normal">              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1104"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1105"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1106"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ValTy-&gt;isIntegerTy() &amp;&amp; ValTy-&gt;getScalarSizeInBits() &lt;= 16)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1107"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ? <a href="#a3f4649c90b5297a0d5c1608da9f6ac9b">getOperandsExtensionCost</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) : 2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1108"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1109"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1110"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Instruction::Select:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1111"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ValTy-&gt;isFloatingPointTy())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1112"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 4; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// No LOC for FP - costs a conditional jump.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1113"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1114"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When selecting based on an i128 comparison, LOC / VSEL is possible</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1115"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// if i128 comparisons are directly supported.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1116"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1117"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/icmpinst">ICmpInst</a> &#42;CI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;ICmpInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getOperand(0)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1118"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CI-&gt;getOperand(0)-&gt;getType()-&gt;isIntegerTy(128))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1119"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ST-&gt;hasVectorEnhancements3() ? 1 : 4;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1120"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1121"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Load On Condition / Select Register available, except for i128.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1122"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> !isInt128InVR(ValTy) ? 1 : 4;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1123"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1126"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VF = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(ValTy)-&gt;getNumElements();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1130"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PredicateExtraCost = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1131"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1132"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Some predicates cost one or two extra instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1228"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (TruncBits || SExtBits || ZExtBits) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1229"><Highlight kind="normal">    FoldedValue = UserI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1230"><Highlight kind="normal">    UserI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(&#42;UserI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a158da2b6d3d938aaa15b6acd00150e2c">user&#95;begin</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1231"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Load (single use) -&gt; trunc/extend (single use) -&gt; UserI</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1232"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1233"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((UserI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#ab4e05d690df389b8b1477c90387b575f">getOpcode</a>() == Instruction::Sub ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1234"><Highlight kind="normal">       UserI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#ab4e05d690df389b8b1477c90387b575f">getOpcode</a>() == Instruction::SDiv ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1235"><Highlight kind="normal">       UserI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#ab4e05d690df389b8b1477c90387b575f">getOpcode</a>() == Instruction::UDiv) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1236"><Highlight kind="normal">      UserI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user/#aa0a2cb1582d1cec317bd205085469ca1">getOperand</a>(1) != FoldedValue)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1237"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Not commutative, only RHS foldable.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1238"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// LoadOrTruncBits holds the number of effectively loaded bits, but 0 if an</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1239"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// extension was made of the load.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1240"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LoadOrTruncBits =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1241"><Highlight kind="normal">      ((SExtBits || ZExtBits) ? 0 : (TruncBits ? TruncBits : LoadedBits));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1242"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">switch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (UserI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#ab4e05d690df389b8b1477c90387b575f">getOpcode</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1243"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Instruction::Add: </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SE: 16-&gt;32, 16/32-&gt;64, z14:16-&gt;64. ZE: 32-&gt;64</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1244"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Instruction::Sub:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1245"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Instruction::ICmp:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1246"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LoadedBits == 32 &amp;&amp; ZExtBits == 64)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1247"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1248"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#91;&#91;fallthrough&#93;&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1249"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Instruction::Mul: </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SE: 16-&gt;32, 32-&gt;64, z14:16-&gt;64</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1337"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Type legalization (via getNumberOfParts) can&#39;t handle structs</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1338"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (TLI-&gt;getValueType(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#aec0b8db50138e2a68aca36959b6692a5">DL</a>, Src, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) == MVT::Other)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1340"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1341"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1342"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FP128 is a legal type but kept in a register pair on older CPUs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1343"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Src-&gt;isFP128Ty() &amp;&amp; !ST-&gt;hasVectorEnhancements1())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1344"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1345"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1346"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a536e22898d28a9340a4204407a75ad5d">NumOps</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1347"><Highlight kind="normal">    (Src-&gt;isVectorTy() ? <a href="#af4be533423e3315d09f9d6ff82049e3b">getNumVectorRegs</a>(Src) : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#a16a2910025aeadfd52f381a78f92faf0">getNumberOfParts</a>(Src));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1348"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1349"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Store/Load reversed saves one instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1350"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (((!Src-&gt;isVectorTy() &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a536e22898d28a9340a4204407a75ad5d">NumOps</a> == 1) || ST-&gt;hasVectorEnhancements2()) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1351"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1352"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opcode == Instruction::Load &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;hasOneUse()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1353"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;LdUser = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;user&#95;begin());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1354"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In case of load -&gt; bswap -&gt; store, return normal cost for the load.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1355"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="#a357c78718ce6fe9ce5716678cb06863d">isBswapIntrinsicCall</a>(LdUser) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1357"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1358"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1359"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/storeinst">StoreInst</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;StoreInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1360"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;StoredVal = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>-&gt;getValueOperand();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1361"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (StoredVal-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a3a402430a1bbe70a9282dcb0e0b6a2cd">hasOneUse</a>() &amp;&amp; <a href="#a357c78718ce6fe9ce5716678cb06863d">isBswapIntrinsicCall</a>(StoredVal))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1362"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1363"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1364"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1365"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1366"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a536e22898d28a9340a4204407a75ad5d">NumOps</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1367"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1368"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1369"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The generic implementation of getInterleavedMemoryOpCost() is based on</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1370"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// adding costs of the memory operations plus all the extracts and inserts</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1371"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// needed for using / defining the vector operands. The SystemZ version does</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1372"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// roughly the same but bases the computations on vector permutations</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1373"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instead.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1374" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzttiimpl/#a1a15e8dd266694612ad050ea8d4b4cbd"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzttiimpl/#a1a15e8dd266694612ad050ea8d4b4cbd">SystemZTTIImpl::getInterleavedMemoryOpCost</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1375"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opcode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;VecTy, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Factor, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> Indices,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1376"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptxas/#ad7d00b71af84502be65ae2de3f8d91dc">AddressSpace</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bb">TTI::TargetCostKind</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1377"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UseMaskForCond, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UseMaskForGaps) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1378"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (UseMaskForCond || UseMaskForGaps)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1379"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#a09ac3c26a04fdf36e4bcc0e725fca41e">BaseT::getInterleavedMemoryOpCost</a>(Opcode, VecTy, Factor, Indices,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1380"><Highlight kind="normal">                                             Alignment, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptxas/#ad7d00b71af84502be65ae2de3f8d91dc">AddressSpace</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1381"><Highlight kind="normal">                                             UseMaskForCond, UseMaskForGaps);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1382"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;VectorType&gt;</a>(VecTy) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1383"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expect a vector type for interleaved memory op&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1384"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1385"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumElts = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(VecTy)-&gt;getNumElements();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1386"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Factor &gt; 1 &amp;&amp; NumElts % Factor == 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Invalid interleave factor&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1387"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VF = NumElts / Factor;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1388"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumEltsPerVecReg = (128U / <a href="#a69eeffbc38c079195008fbfb5aaad0b9">getScalarSizeInBits</a>(VecTy));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1389"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumVectorMemOps = <a href="#af4be533423e3315d09f9d6ff82049e3b">getNumVectorRegs</a>(VecTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1390"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumPermutes = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1391"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1392"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opcode == Instruction::Load) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1393"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Loading interleave groups may have gaps, which may mean fewer</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1394"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loads. Find out how many vectors will be loaded in total, and in how</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1395"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// many of them each value will be in.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1396"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> UsedInsts(NumVectorMemOps, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1397"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::vector&lt;BitVector&gt; ValueVecs(Factor, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a>(NumVectorMemOps, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1398"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Index : Indices)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1399"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Elt = 0; Elt &lt; VF; ++Elt) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1400"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Vec = (Index + Elt &#42; Factor) / NumEltsPerVecReg;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1401"><Highlight kind="normal">        UsedInsts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a62237ebe27691377a942abe7446332ec">set</a>(Vec);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1402"><Highlight kind="normal">        ValueVecs&#91;Index&#93;.set(Vec);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1403"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1404"><Highlight kind="normal">    NumVectorMemOps = UsedInsts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a568ff706b8c5991bd299c8c00b803897">count</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1405"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1406"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Index : Indices) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1407"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Estimate that each loaded source vector containing this Index</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1408"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// requires one operation, except that vperm can handle two input</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1409"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// registers first time for each dst vector.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1410"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumSrcVecs = ValueVecs&#91;Index&#93;.count();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1411"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumDstVecs = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9dda4472ee0b7ea92ab49eedf6e13d50">divideCeil</a>(VF &#42; <a href="#a69eeffbc38c079195008fbfb5aaad0b9">getScalarSizeInBits</a>(VecTy), 128U);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1412"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a> (NumSrcVecs &gt;= NumDstVecs &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expected at least as many sources&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1413"><Highlight kind="normal">      NumPermutes += std::max(1U, NumSrcVecs - NumDstVecs);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1414"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1415"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1416"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Estimate the permutes for each stored vector as the smaller of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1417"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// number of elements and the number of source vectors. Subtract one per</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1418"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// dst vector for vperm (S.A.).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1419"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumSrcVecs = std::min(NumEltsPerVecReg, Factor);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1420"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumDstVecs = NumVectorMemOps;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1421"><Highlight kind="normal">    NumPermutes += (NumDstVecs &#42; NumSrcVecs) - NumDstVecs;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1422"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1423"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1424"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Cost of load/store operations and the permutations needed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1425"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumVectorMemOps + NumPermutes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1426"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1427"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1428" lineLink="#a3cf638f94373302708e10f3bffecd8f3"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="#a3cf638f94373302708e10f3bffecd8f3">getIntAddReductionCost</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumVec, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ScalarBits) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1429"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1430"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Binary Tree of N/2 + N/4 + ... operations yields N - 1 operations total.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1431"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += NumVec - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1432"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For integer adds, VSUM creates shorter reductions on the final vector.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1433"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += (ScalarBits &lt; 32) ? 3 : 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1434"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1435"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1436"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1437" lineLink="#adc334ed6d48bd887ada88cfdc2190ae5"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="#adc334ed6d48bd887ada88cfdc2190ae5">getFastReductionCost</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumVec, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumElems,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1438"><Highlight kind="normal">                                     </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ScalarBits) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1439"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumEltsPerVecReg = (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/systemz/#a5e2f6288a79b32c4bc9f22fe3f3222b2">SystemZ::VectorBits</a> / ScalarBits);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1440"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1441"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Binary Tree of N/2 + N/4 + ... operations yields N - 1 operations total.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1442"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += NumVec - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1443"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For each shuffle / arithmetic layer, we need 2 instructions, and we need</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1444"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// log2(Elements in Last Vector) layers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1445"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += 2 &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a058782b98991f0719657d9008d3df41b">Log2&#95;32&#95;Ceil</a>(std::min(NumElems, NumEltsPerVecReg));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1446"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1447"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1448"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1449" lineLink="#a1f4ffbc3fad305641b7ca997a89aa002"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a1f4ffbc3fad305641b7ca997a89aa002">customCostReductions</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opcode) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1450"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opcode == Instruction::FAdd || Opcode == Instruction::FMul ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1451"><Highlight kind="normal">         Opcode == Instruction::Add || Opcode == Instruction::Mul;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1452"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1453"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1454"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1455" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzttiimpl/#acbad6d70dd3351b812d5b74353574207"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzttiimpl/#acbad6d70dd3351b812d5b74353574207">SystemZTTIImpl::getArithmeticReductionCost</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opcode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype">VectorType</a> &#42;Ty,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1456"><Highlight kind="normal">                                           std::optional&lt;FastMathFlags&gt; FMF,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1457"><Highlight kind="normal">                                           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bb">TTI::TargetCostKind</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1458"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ScalarBits = Ty-&gt;getScalarSizeInBits();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1459"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The following is only for subtargets with vector math, non-ordered</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1460"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// reductions, and reasonable scalar sizes for int and fp add/mul.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1461"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="#a1f4ffbc3fad305641b7ca997a89aa002">customCostReductions</a>(Opcode) &amp;&amp; ST-&gt;hasVector() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1462"><Highlight kind="normal">      !<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a7aecc3cf03beff532c2b8bfe81e500c8">TTI::requiresOrderedReduction</a>(FMF) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1463"><Highlight kind="normal">      ScalarBits &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/systemz/#a5e2f6288a79b32c4bc9f22fe3f3222b2">SystemZ::VectorBits</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1464"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumVectors = <a href="#af4be533423e3315d09f9d6ff82049e3b">getNumVectorRegs</a>(Ty);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1465"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumElems = ((<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype">FixedVectorType</a> &#42;)Ty)-&gt;getNumElements();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1466"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Integer Add is using custom code gen, that needs to be accounted for.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1467"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opcode == Instruction::Add)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1468"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a3cf638f94373302708e10f3bffecd8f3">getIntAddReductionCost</a>(NumVectors, ScalarBits);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1469"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The base cost is the same across all other arithmetic instructions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1470"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1471"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="#adc334ed6d48bd887ada88cfdc2190ae5">getFastReductionCost</a>(NumVectors, NumElems, ScalarBits);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1472"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// But we need to account for the final op involving the scalar operand.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1473"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((Opcode == Instruction::FAdd) || (Opcode == Instruction::FMul))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1474"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1475"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1476"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1477"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// otherwise, fall back to the standard implementation</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1478"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#aacaa7d017eb34bf5050b2fb7f6dd91c4">BaseT::getArithmeticReductionCost</a>(Opcode, Ty, FMF, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1491"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Binary Tree of N/2 + N/4 + ... operations yields N - 1 operations total.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1493"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For the final vector, we need shuffle + min/max operations, and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1495"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += 2 &#42; (std::min(NumElems, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/systemz/#a5e2f6288a79b32c4bc9f22fe3f3222b2">SystemZ::VectorBits</a> / ScalarBits) - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
